1.name: Occultist
1.flavourText:
Throw off the chains
of fear and embrace that
 which was forbidden.

2.name: Elementalist
2.flavourText:
Feed a storm with savage intent 
and not even the strongest walls
will hold it back.

3.name: Necromancer
3.flavourText:
Embrace the serene
power that is undeath.
